name: Whithin two curses
description:
The lands of Aldair were protected by the gods since memorial times, everyone lived in harmony and prosperity. However, after stopping to be worshiped, the goddess Morrigan was corrupted and sent herds of monsters that destroyed Aldair. In a last attempt to stop Morrigan the other gods and goddesses sent a white stag to guide two heroes, Meredith a powerful druid, and Kenneth a skilled knight, to defeat Morrigan and restore the peace in Aldair. After the appearance of the white stag, Meredith and Kenneth began their journey. 

Currently the available download is a demo.
